Description: 
This application implements a command to demonstrate the use of the tansaction.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use TransactionSample.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the TransactionSample.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "NestedTransaction" command, which demonstrates aborting the transaction and draws a red line.
